subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Allen Iverson had 26 points and 9 assists and led a fourth-quarter run that sent the Denver Nuggets past the Nets, 125-114, Friday at the Izod Center.
snippet: Allen Iverson had 26 points and 9 assists and led a fourth-quarter run that sent the Denver Nuggets past the Nets, 125-114, Friday at the Izod Center.
